head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Two Guilty Of Heroin Smuggling

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Two Guilty Of Heroin Smuggling

block.p: Two Nigerian men have been convicted of conspiring to smuggle heroin into the United States after an investigation that stretched from Kabul to Manhattan, federal prosecutors said. The men, Emmanuel Obi Maduka and Chimdi Ibiam, were convicted on Wednesday in Federal District Court of conspiracy to sell heroin and smuggle it into the United States, said Michael J. Garcia, the United States attorney.
